de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.preprocessing

Class BookSplitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.preprocessing.BookSplitter

  • public class BookSplitter
extends java.lang.Object
    Tries to divides entire books provided as PDFs according to the "Table of contents"(TOC) and a page offset, pointing to the numerical page of the pdf at which the first mentioned article of the TOC starts. This is necessary because the proceedings of the Digital Humanities Conference are provided as entire books. Therefore we first need to split them into the several parts. TODO Implementing what to do with parts: save as parts.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Klaus Lyko

      • getPart

        public org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument getPart(int startPage,
                                           int length)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a part of a PDDocument. The part is defined by it's (real) start page number and a length. E.g. if you want to extract only page 5 call getPart(5, 1).
        Parameters:
        startPage - Start page of the part.
        length - Number of Pages to extract. If length <= 0 the complete rest of the document is used.
        Returns:
        PDDocument of the part.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
